overview.en: TrueFi (TRU) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. TrueFi has a current supply of 1,446,312,655 with 140,608,485 in circulation. The last known price of TrueFi is 0.36620727 USD and is down -3.45 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 15 active market(s) with $19,912,524.55 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://truefi.io/.
